§lEfficiency II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a lantern as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lPower II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an arrow (R) and a flint & steel (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R r§r

§lProtection II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of leather as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lSharpness II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a flint & steel as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lUnbreaking II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a block of obsidian as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
